song.englishname: You're in My Brain/Angels Fall Down

english.segment1: It's so urgent; it's so desperate. I can feel it in my bones (yeah). To find a shovel and start digging. Under the water, bury myself
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. You're in my brain. In my brain. The life inside is breaking out. You're in my brain. In my brain. The life inside is breaking out
english.segment3: It's getting stronger; I can't contain it. It's like a fire in my bones (yeah). It's taking over, recreating. Transforming my mind (yeah)
english.segment5: You're in my mind, in my mind. Breaking out [repeat]
